June 14, 2014 D Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest (Third Section)
Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest (Third Section) 30 Set Test and Own Choice Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest bernisches-kantonal-musikfest-third-section
None Switzerland
Third
Pit Stop at Purgatory
Aarwangen, BE, Switzerland Jury Set Work: Christophe Jeanbourquin, Marcel Hunn, Christoph Bangerter Jury Own Choice: Corsin Tuor, Remo Capra, Peter Schmid
Own Choices played: Bel-Air - Goff Richards, 3x Cambridgeshire Impressions - Rieks van der Velde, Devon Fantasy - Eric Ball, Partita - Edward Gregson, The Legend of Hans Roth - Howard Lorriman, Flight - Mario Bürki, Mountain Views - Bertrand Moren, Pacific Dreams - Jacob de Haan, Silva Carbonaria - Roger Derongé, Land of Legends - A. L. Schulte, Milford Sound - Roger Derongé, Ross Roy - Jacob de Haan, 2x Saint-Saëns Variations - Philip Sparke, An English Suite - Michael Ball, Columbus - Rob Goorhuis, Fantasy on an English Folksong - Thomas Trachsel, High Flyers - A. R. Mackereth, Antarctica - Carl Wittrock, Bellum Belgicum - Rieks van der Velde, Festival Overutre - Alan Fernie
May 13, 2014, 3:07 p.m. June 7, 2019, 8:02 p.m.
